nodes.text: At least one member of a species of furred, bipedal creatures with green tongues lived on the Forest Moon of Endor. The creatures had sharp teeth and red eyes. One of them attacked a group of mimphs and tried to eat them before the Ewoks Wicket Wystri Warrick and Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka swooped down on a skin glider and rescued the mimphs.
This creature appears in the opening credits of the second season of the Ewoks animated cartoon series. The beast does not reappear in any of the episodes of the series, however.
